files.description: Runnable smoke-test script that captures python --version and validates basic imports, writing results to outputs/qa/logs/<timestamp>_smoke_test.log (and optionally updating a committed baseline log).
Committed baseline artifact containing a previously generated smoke-test log used for future comparisons/CI verification.

missionDescription: Implement and run a minimal smoke-test command that writes /outputs/qa/logs/<timestamp>_smoke_test.log (python --version, basic imports) and commit/record the produced artifact as the new baseline for all future runs.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete the urgent task identified by Meta-Coordinator
